EmailTemplate.description: Hi <>, Thanks for the update. This message is to confirm that Pivotal Support ticket #81635 has been closed out. Â I hope that your experience with Pivotal Support has been a pleasant one and that I have been able to provide you with help for all of your issues. If you have any additional questions or need further assistance on the issues discussed in this ticket, you can simply reply to this notification and the ticket will be reopened. Thanks and Regards, ....
